reviewText: The Fireman Sam stories are well produced and share great ideas for children to learn. They are favorites with my grandchildren.

reviewText: While I admit Fireman Sam is not one of my faovrites, it is my boys. For me their accents drive me crazy! The show though is wholesome for kids and it is the ony fireman show for kids! My boys love to watch Fireman Sam saving the day and driving his truck. There are five episodes on this DVD and my boys watch them over and over. There are snowman, polar bears and Christmas fun throughout this DVD, making it a perfect holiday DVD to get kids into the Christmas mood! While this DVD is winter-themed, it is one we will be watching it throughout the year. If your child likes Fireman Sam or firemen, this is a perfect DVD.Episodes:The Big ChillThe Pontypandy Polar BearIce Cold in PontypandySnowball of DoomFloodlightsBonus Features:Fireman Sam's Safety ShowMerry Christmas Everybody Music Video

reviewText: Fireman Sams holiday dvd makes a great holiday gift for kids ages 2-10. It teaches them about community helpers. It also teaches them that no matter what time of year the fire department is always there to help!
